runs.comm: And we're off. Bosman off the mark working that one to midwicket.
Full and just outside off. Gibbs just opens the blade and runs it down to 3rd man.
Short and straight. Pulled away straight to midwicket. No single this time
Short and just too straight, Bosman pulls it away too deep square leg. Gets a walkable single.
Is that a drop? Gibbs seemed to might have just gotten a little edge, but the keeper, standing up, puts it down any way. That's the end of the first over.
Excellent delivery! Bosman hs a hard swing at it, but the away swing only manages to beat the edge.
Half volley. Bosman hammers it hard into the ground and straight to cover. Should have capitilized on that.
Good line and length from Shahadat, forcing Bosman to play and defend at that.
Shorter this time, Good bounce and Bosman tries to work it past point. Not succeeding this time though. Four dots.
Another good delivery leading to another defensive shot. Shahadat getting Bosman out of his comfort zone here.
Finally Bosman gets the boundary. Just too straight this time. Bosman hammers it through midwicket this time. Classic Bosman.
Another boundary, Gibbs goes for is traditional little leg glance/sweepshot. This time gets an top edge straight over the keeper. No fielders there.
Half volley outside off. Punished by Gibbs this time. Cover had o chance to get to that. Went like a bullet.
Forward defence from Gibbs this time. Better line and length.
This time the paddle-sweep works better. The outfield lightening fast tonight.
Another one, hammered through the covers once again. You simply can't bowl half-volleys to Gibbs. Take that!
Better from Syed Rasel this time. Good line and length. Good over for the South Africans.
Bosman goes across the line attempting to clear midwicket but gets a leading edge over the top of cover.
Short and straight. Bosman rocks back on the backfoot and pulls it away mightily over the vacant midwicket fence.
Oh no.. Leg-byes to the short 45 fielder, takes a shy down to the bowler's end. Goes straight through all the fielders backing up.
Forward defence. Gibs sees the fielders are pushed to the edge of the inner ring and takes the quick single. Well run.
Half-volley again! Bosman goes over the top of mid off. Splendid shot!
Another half-volley to Bosman! This time straight into the legs though, Bosman flicks it over midwicket for another boundary. 20 from the over.

Gone! Gibbs swings at a widish one, gets an inside edge and the ball crashes into his stumps. Gibbs, the dangerman, gone scoring a quickfire 18. Dropped early in his innings but luckily for Bangladesh not too costly.
Wide down leg. Keeper standing up to the stumps had no chance of stopping that.Lady Luck seems to favour the South Africans.
Good delivery, Forward defence.
Just too straight. Struck on the pads but scampers a single anyway.
Worked just past midwicket, Ontong very quick with the running and they manage an easy second
HUGE ONE! Full and straight into his legs again. Bosman picks that one up and knocks it into the scoreboard over square leg. That's enormous!
Spinner pushed to mid off. Ontong gets off the mark.
Bosman tries to take on the spinner first ball he faces, looking to go over the top, gets a thickish top edge and skies it straight up to mid off.
Ontong cuts it out to the deep cover fence. Overthrows causes a second.
Worked away to deep cover again.
Comes down the track and works it to shortish 3rd man.
Well-bowled. Beats the edge of Justin Ontong's blade. Good over.
Driven staight to mid off. Good delivery though right in the blockhole.
EDGE! Goes just past the keeper standing up. Excellent slower delivery!
Right in the blockhole again. Pushed down to long on though. Just one this time although Ontong ran hard.
Full and straight. Hits the pads. No legs. Shout for lbw tuned down/. Must have pitched outside leg.
Huge appeal for a stumping, not out though by Mr Howell. Looked close on the 3rd umpire replay though. Bangladesh might feel a bit unlucky. Just enough doubt I would say. Only just.
Worked to point and scampers a quick single. Rain seems to be imminent
Shortish and wide. AB hammers it through the covers.
Beats the outside edge again. Only just. Huge thunderstorms around the ground. And some lightening too.
Dropped!! First ball back after the delay. Cut straight to cover and dropped.
Worked to third man, gets aquick single again aand we are off again. Raining again..
Gone! First ball after the weather delay. Ontong goes for the big heave over deep midwicket. Gives it a bit too much air and hits it down the fielder's throaght.
EDGE! Gets a little bottom edge on that attempted late cut and flies through the keepers legs and down to the fence where it is cut off and Dminy comes charging back for a third.
Play and miss. Quicker delivery. Attempted late cut.
Drop and go. Keeper takes a shy at the bowler's end. Luckily for AB it's far wide.
Top edge from the sweep shot down to fine leg.
Dropped! De Villiers comes down the track, has a real crack at it and hits it as high as a cricket ball goes. Dropped by the fielder at mid on.
Worked away for an easy single.
Driven through the coers to the deep cover fielder. Easily manages the second.
Crunched down to long off this time. No second this time.
Another risky quick one. This time off the pads.
Down the track and across the line. Just drops about 5 metres farther. Gets another quick one.
Tickled around the corner and gets a walkable single.
Fine little snick through to to the keeper. Duminy tries to late cut the ball down to third man. Gets the fine edge and the keeper takes it second time around.
Good delivery first up. Tentative forward defence.
Short and wide. Pushed just past point and gets the easy one.
Forward defence. Quick run stolen.
Good delivery, Morkel edges it down to third man and gets three as a reward for some good running.
Pushed to cover. Good over for Bangladesh. 3 overs remaining
Right in the blockhole. De Villiers takes a swing. Nothing there.
Pushes a wide one out to deep cover for another easy single.
Another single. Pushed to cover this time. Just nudging away here.
Big one. Hammers high and handsome over deep cover. Gives himself some room to free his arms.
Down the track and over the top this time. Boundary again!
Pushed out to the deep again. Remains on strike.
Shortish and outside off. Smacked out to deep cover again.
Helped along to third man. Short and widish again.
Cuts it powerfully to cover off the backfoot again by De Viliiers.
Morkel goes for the big heave over midwicket. Nowhere near the ball tough and all he hears is the clash off the ball and his stumps. Well bowled.
Another drop and go single. Just worked to midwicket.
Comes down the track and works it to shortish third man.
Gone! De Villiers looking for the big slog-sweep this time. Just too full I would say and the ball crashes into his stumps.
Right in the blockhole. Squeezed out to deep midwicket though for an easy single.
Driven powerfully down the ground but straight to long off this time.
Another wicket for Razzak. otha attempts a reverse sweepshot. Bowled around his legs though. Leg stump hit hard this time.
Wide down leg.
Worked away to deep point for another single. Last ball to come
Right in the blockhole again. Kleinveldt punches it down to long on. So Bangladesh will chase 122 to win using D/L method.
